%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW payband_grouped

    AS

SELECT 

    PS_group AS PSGroupCode,
    First(Pay_Band_Description) AS Description    
    
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr
WHERE PS_group IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY PS_group;

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim)
- **New Data:** where a PA in the source does not exist as an PSGroupCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on PA in source and PSGroupCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an PSGroupCode in the target exists but the same PA doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View payband_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build payband_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW payband_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PSGroupCode IS NULL
        THEN T7.PayBandID
        ELSE NULL
    END as PayBandID, -- surrogate key
    T1.PSGroupCode, -- source system id
    T1.Description, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PSGroupCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PSGroupCode = T7.PSGroupCode AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PSGroupCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.')))  <> T7.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.PSGroupCode IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PSGroupCode IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T7.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM payband_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim T7 ON T1.PSGroupCode = T7.PSGroupCode AND
                                                T7.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.PSGroupCode = T7.PSGroupCode AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PSGroupCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.')))  <> T7.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T7.PSGroupCode IS NULL -- new employee
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.PSGroupCode IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )

- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **payband_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View payband_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Creating new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW payband_dim_changed_rows

    AS

SELECT 
    PayBandID,
    PSGroupCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM payband_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    PayBandID,
    PSGroupCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim
WHERE PSGroupCode IN (SELECT PSGroupCode FROM payband_dim_new WHERE PayBandID IS NULL) 
AND IsActive = 'Y' ;

# View payband_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. PA from SAPHR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.payband_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim AS Target
USING payband_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.PayBandID = Target.PayBandID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.payband_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new PersonnelAreaID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PayBandID NULLS LAST) AS PayBandID,
    PSGroupCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim;
